attributes.action: Use some funding to help the charity DEPHER.
attributes.additional_details: DEPHER has helped over 1400 elderly and disabled UK residents with the potential to help the UK as a whole but can't do so without the necessary help and funding.
attributes.background: DEPHER is a CIC charity that helps the elderly and disabled in the harsh winter months with free plumbing and heating repairs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because starting a petition isn't the way to apply for funding for a charity or community project.

You may be able to apply for funding as a community project here:

https://www.gov.uk/apply-funding-community-project

You may also be able to apply for funding as a business here:

https://www.gov.uk/business-support-helpline
